content.p: The University works in partnership with the following trade unions: The University Council recognises the above trade unions. Further details on the agreements between the University and the recognised trade unions are available in Workspace. On the merger of the School of Nursing into the University on 1 August 1995, RCN and RCM entered into joint agreements with UCU to represent their professional members for pay bargaining purposes at a national level, and for consultation at a local level. RCN and RCM retain their representative rights on professional matters. This section includes information on how to join a union and the subscriptions payable. This section includes information on the activities undertaken by the Trade Unions. This section includes information on the University's two consultative committees.
